data.text:
Walking around the campus, I saw a familiar figure. 
...I thought she was supposed to be in class right now...
data.processed:
<story>Walking around the campus, I saw a familiar figure. 
<story>...I thought she was supposed to be in class right now...

data.text:
Hey, it's you. 
What a coincidence.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Hey, it's you. 
<story>What a coincidence.

data.text:
Singing lessons. 
But I didn't feel comfortable in the classroom.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Singing lessons. 
<story>But I didn't feel comfortable in the classroom.

data.text:
I'm looking for a nice place to have lessons, 
with the teacher's permission.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I'm looking for a nice place to have lessons, 
<story>with the teacher's permission.

data.text:
Mr. C.B. is always honest with herself. 
What kind of place makes her feel good...?

choices.text: Can I follow you to find a place?

data.processed:
<story>Mr. C.B. is always honest with herself. 
<story>What kind of place makes her feel good...?

data.text:
I don't mind, but... 
you have weird interests, don't you?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I don't mind, but... 
<story>you have weird interests, don't you?

data.text:
Running through the wind~♪ 
Can't stop now♪
data.name: Mr. C.B.

choices.text: I can hear your voice echoing a lot.

data.processed:
<story>Running through the wind~♪ 
<story>Can't stop now♪

data.text: Yeah, it's nice to sing in a big space, but...
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Yeah, it's nice to sing in a big space, but...

data.text: Hmm, I don't think this is the place!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Hmm, I don't think this is the place!

data.text:
...Hm, I guess not here either. 
I don't feel any different than singing in the classroom.
data.name: Mr. C.B.

choices.text: A real stage is no good?

data.processed:
<story>...Hm, I guess not here either. 
<story>I don't feel any different than singing in the classroom.

data.text:
I'm embarrassed when people ask me that. 
Because I don't really know the answer myself.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I'm embarrassed when people ask me that. 
<story>Because I don't really know the answer myself.

data.text:
It just needs to be more... hm! 
Well, never mind. Let's move on!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>It just needs to be more... hm! 
<story>Well, never mind. Let's move on!

data.text:
Is it so uncertain what she is looking for...? 
I couldn't imagine what was going on in her head, 
so I could only follow along.
data.processed:
<story>Is it so uncertain what she is looking for...? 
<story>I couldn't imagine what was going on in her head, 
<story>so I could only follow along.

data.text: Hmmm~, the wind feels good.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Hmmm~, the wind feels good.

data.text: And... yeah, this view!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>And... yeah, this view!

data.text: ...The urge to run at the speed of lightー...
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>...The urge to run at the speed of lightー...

data.text:
I'm prepared to sacrifice anything 
to achieve the strength I desire!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I'm prepared to sacrifice anything 
<story>to achieve the strength I desire!

data.text: Yeah, great! It's here!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Yeah, great! It's here!

data.text:
The rooftop... The blue sky is open and airy. 
But surrounded by a wire fence, it doesn't feel like a stage――
data.processed:
<story>The rooftop... The blue sky is open and airy. 
<story>But surrounded by a wire fence, it doesn't feel like a stage――

data.text:
You should look over there too. 
You can see far out into the distance on this broad stage.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>You should look over there too. 
<story>You can see far out into the distance on this broad stage.

data.text:
Then there are the sky-blue reflections of the buildings. 
Each one looks like a spectator waving a penlight!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Then there are the sky-blue reflections of the buildings. 
<story>Each one looks like a spectator waving a penlight!

data.text:
And with the spotlight of the sun! 
Hey, this is the best stage!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>And with the spotlight of the sun! 
<story>Hey, this is the best stage!

data.text:
With her words, I felt as if a stage appeared before my eyes. 
The way she sang spontaneously in the midst of it seemed to 
confirm her words.
data.processed:
<story>With her words, I felt as if a stage appeared before my eyes. 
<story>The way she sang spontaneously in the midst of it seemed to 
<story>confirm her words.

data.text:
Heh, right? 
...Yeah, okay. Will I be able to respond now?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Heh, right? 
<story>...Yeah, okay. Will I be able to respond now?

data.text: I'm serious about how I feel, you know.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>I'm serious about how I feel, you know.

data.text:
My coach is the kind of person who takes singing seriously. 
I have to respond to their feelings with mine.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>My coach is the kind of person who takes singing seriously. 
<story>I have to respond to their feelings with mine.

data.text:
Of course, I could sing in the classroom, but... 
Anyway, I didn't like it. It was insincere.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Of course, I could sing in the classroom, but... 
<story>Anyway, I didn't like it. It was insincere.

data.text: Now I can finally go back――
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Now I can finally go back――

data.text: Heyー! Who are those students on the roof during class!?
data.name: Teacher
data.processed: <story>Heyー! Who are those students on the roof during class!?

data.text:
Oh, it's the school counselor... 
Sorry! Explain it to him!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Oh, it's the school counselor... 
<story>Sorry! Explain it to him!

data.text:
With her tounge slightly out, 
Mr. C.B. slid easily past the school counselor.
data.processed:
<story>With her tounge slightly out, 
<story>Mr. C.B. slid easily past the school counselor.

data.text:
Mr. C.B. was being honest with herself 
in order to perform at her best. 
I think that's truly like her.
data.processed:
<story>Mr. C.B. was being honest with herself 
<story>in order to perform at her best. 
<story>I think that's truly like her.

title: Clear skies, silence and a director
